Reviews.Content: bad pay attention arrive walk past entry building seeing hotl desk 5th floor building elevator breakfast poor choice dishes quadruple receptionist speaks fluently english french hotel modern single double level rome bathrooms equipped modern wifi flat tv screen french channel doesnt matter youre rome watch tv shower repaired quickly rome noise coming street doubleglazing efficient location near piazza di spagna via del corso borghese garden

Reviews.Title: “fabulous”
Reviews.Author: amanda g
Reviews.Content: family 4 stayed nov 2011 complaints hotels brilliant location walking distance othe fantastic attractions rome offer getting reception 24hours looked breakfast ok kids moaned eggs modern hotel mod cons check spa bath relaxing careful local restuarants talk food privilage rome fabulous stay york hope hotels match standard modern hotel

Reviews.Title: “Clean central location modern and new”
Reviews.Author: napervilletraveler
Reviews.Content: hotel 15 min walk steps 2 blocks via condotti shopping five minutes staff extremely cordial helpful breakfast adequate filling free late items run level sometimes balcony view beautiful bathroom huge nice toiletries rainfall shower heads nice expected clean nice flat screen free wifi value rome

Reviews.Content: hi stayed april cynthia receptionist excellent helpful excellent smart apartment jacuzzi room… comfortable beds quiet breakfast self service… plans add facilities floors top class hotel… doesnt bar steps hotel excellent jazz bar food fantastic location accessible

Reviews.Title: “Horrible service and hotel experience!! Location was the main upside.”
Reviews.Author: ReemQtr
Reviews.Content: friend women stayed trevi collection 3 nights mid april 2011 excited rome avid travellers taking time holiday truly experience hotel i’m surprised reviews hotel actually reviews encouraged decide book hotel explain dissatisfied quickly note pros 1 hotel location 2 bathroom size clean 3 free internet wifi hotel evening 4 medium suitcases hotel located 4th 5th floor reception 5th floor lobby enter building building shared hotel offices elevator building extremely tiny trips elevator bags reception checked person encountered friendly portly loud named believe reception manager checked key card told 4th floor meant taking luggage tiny elevator twice didn’t offer assist didn’t offer 5th floor available occupancy chart screen tired luggage glass door front corridor scan key card corridor key card press button corridor key card key card lights reception guy checked key card stayed looked didn’t card reluctant responded arrange tomorrow didn’t understand couldn’t time size paying pictures real expected bed uncomfortable minibar stocked refrigerator didn’t minibar cold kettle tea instant coffee called iron told irons allowed fire reasons brought travel iron allowed told wouldn’t able booking breakfast mediocre juices fresh checked guy checked cold didn’t stay proceeded checkout process didn’t breakfast morning friend possibly coffee person coffee friend hard time late coffee friend apologized told told person coffee please note check extend except charge leave bags flight evening receipt credit card receipt told leave bags checking european lady children checked hotel surprised nice hotel guy respectful woman treated worse lady children drink tea coffee water helped daughter luggage discriminated bad especially paying amount money hotel expect level service value money receive definitely treated treated guests tolerate treatment hotel managing reception able receive people world staying hotel definitely recommend colleagues friends family

Reviews.Content: wife son daughter returned week rome stayed hotel 2 satisfied hotel located leave hotel walk quiet street 1 minute top spanish steps 5 minute walk takes fountain close walked 2 3 times day evening 15 minute walk takes piazza navone 30 minutes easy walk streets spacious clean bathrooms huge modern heard tiny ones rome happy breakfast included nice blonde girl happy bring coffee morning liked automatic morning sat girls front desk english satisfied amenities highly recommend travelling rome

Reviews.Title: “Extremely comportable hotel in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Taner_tr06
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights located 5th floor space bathroom included spa clean quiet staff hotel excellent hotel secure cleaning staff respectfull unlimited free speed internet available wireless lobby ethernet cable hotel provide location hotel suitable reach spanish steps fontana trevi metro stations barbarini spagna elevator station bath toilets clean usable breakfast nice foods including egg salami strictly advice travellers stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “new hotel in great position”
Reviews.Author: Joshuadp
Reviews.Content: stayed trevi collection 3 nights simply loved location breakfast nice spacious bathroom fantastic loved 3 minute stroll spanish steps price expect computer business centre wifi plug space wifi phone laptop didnt own cable spagna metro station catch lift walk hill towards hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, stylish hotel”
Reviews.Author: marinaay
Reviews.Content: stayed trevi collection hotel december 2010 located quiet nice street 5 minutes walk piazza di spagna luxury shopping via condotti via metro station piazza di spagna barberini line hotel occupies floors building 4th 5th clean modern actually furniture bathroom equipment tv etc breakfast nice fresh delicious friendly help help assistance definately recommend hotel
